StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MSupd_NROTC_BOOST]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @c1 int,@c2 date.me,@c3 date.me,@c4 varchar(2),@c5 varchar(15),@c6 date.me,@pkc1 int ,@bitmap binary(1) as if substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 1 = 1 begin update [NROTC_BOOST] set [NWA_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 1 when 1 then @c1 else [NWA_ID] end ,[PROGRAM_BEGIN_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 2 when 2 then @c2 else [PROGRAM_BEGIN_DATE] end ,[PROGRAM_GRAD_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 4 when 4 then @c3 else [PROGRAM_GRAD_DATE] end ,[ADVANCED_PROGRAM] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 8 when 8 then @c4 else [ADVANCED_PROGRAM] end ,[USER_LOGIN] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 16 when 16 then @c5 else [USER_LOGIN] end ,[UPDATE_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 32 when 32 then @c6 else [UPDATE_DATE] end where [NWA_ID] = @pkc1 if @@rowcount = 0 if @@microso.version>0x07320000 exec sp_MSreplraiserror 20598 end else begin update [NROTC_BOOST] set [PROGRAM_BEGIN_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 2 when 2 then @c2 else [PROGRAM_BEGIN_DATE] end ,[PROGRAM_GRAD_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 4 when 4 then @c3 else [PROGRAM_GRAD_DATE] end ,[ADVANCED_PROGRAM] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 8 when 8 then @c4 else [ADVANCED_PROGRAM] end ,[USER_LOGIN] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 16 when 16 then @c5 else [USER_LOGIN] end ,[UPDATE_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 32 when 32 then @c6 else [UPDATE_DATE] end where [NWA_ID] = @pkc1 if @@rowcount = 0 if @@microso.version>0x07320000 exec sp_MSreplraiserror 20598 end
